LabelText: Capture details of the attack (traffic volume, protocol, source IPs, time of onset)
Classify type of attack (volumetric, application-layer, state exhaustion)
Engage ISP, upstream provider, or cloud mitigation service
Activate WAF rules, rate limiting, geo-blocks, or DDoS protection profiles
Identify whether the attack correlates with extortion or ransomware activity
Monitor performance of affected services and record metrics
Determine if any backend services experienced outages or data loss
Notify leadership, customers, and regulatory bodies as appropriate
Collect logs and packet captures for post-incident investigation
Update firewall rules, mitigation filters, and playbooks based on lessons learned
